channel.title: A few remaining problems
channel.description:
Ok I'm nearly done with my server. Remains a few problems tho, lets take the most annoying one first:
Some items when equipped it will make my character invisible. Like the Gnome Scarf.
Also Dragon Chain makes males invisible, but not females. Is there a way to change that?

item.title: A few remaining problems
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Client side bug I believe

Read full topic
